data.title: [Solved] What are the characteristics of fifth stage Asian American films
data.meta_description: On Studocu you find all the lecture notes, summaries and study guides you need to pass your exams with better grades.
data.text:
How does The Farewell show collectivism? Choose one

Group of answer choices

The family staying in the US to avoid bothering Nai Nai

The family letting Billi tell Nai Nai about her cancer diagnosis

The family holding a small wedding for the nephew

The family deciding not to tell Nai Nai about her cancer diagnosis

How does The Farewell show collectivism? Choose one

Group of answer choices

The family staying in the US to avoid bothering Nai Nai

The family letting Billi tell Nai Nai about her cancer diagnosis

The family holding a small wedding for the nephew

The family deciding not to tell Nai Nai about her cancer diagnosis

How does The Farewell show collectivism?

Group of answer choices

The family staying in the US to avoid bothering Nai Nai

The family letting Billi tell Nai Nai about her cancer diagnosis

The family holding a small wedding for the nephew

The family deciding not to tell Nai Nai about her cancer diagnosis

In The Farewell, what is the reason Billi's uncle gives for not telling NaiNai about her cancer diagnosis?

Group of answer choices

The doctors are wrong about the diagnosis.

NaiNai is too dependent on her family.

The family is carrying the emotional burden for her.

In China it's important to be individualistic.
